column2: What are the main ordered steps in the LIB/NIB manufacturing process?
column3: Mixing ; Coating ; Drying ; Calendering ; Cutting ; Assemblying ; Filling ; Forming ; Degassing

column2: What are the main ordered steps in the RFB manufacturing process?
column3: Stack assembly ; Stack compression ; Stack sealing (glueing) ;  (Stack testing) ; Tanks assemblying
